name: BallBoy!
description:
Designed for speedrunning!

Navigate BallBoy (it's a ball, not a boy, but it is BallBoy) to the glowing yellow exit... why am I saying this? Come on. It's a 2d Platformer. You know what to do.

Array keys to move. Space to restart. R to reset completely. Do it quick. Beat your highscore.

Current World Record:

World 1 - 0:57s (v0.1)

-- If you beat the world record, submit it in a comment below.
